TEXT.TITLE: CALIFORNIA MICRO <CAMD> GETS ADDITIONAL CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: California Micro Devices Corp said it received an additional 3.2 mln dlr contract from General Dynamics Corp <GD> to supply electronic components contained in the guidance control for Defense Electronics Systems. Reuter
